adhyayane spaṣṭam tad upayogasya abhāvāt

original: 'adhyayanakārye hi dṛṣṭamarthajñānaṃ tenānuṣṭhīyamānakarmajanyapūrvaṃ vā yat tatrobhayatrāpi upayogo nāstītyāha - tanniyamasya ceti /
analyzed: adhyayana kārye hi dṛṣṭam artha jñānam tena anuṣṭhīyamāna karma janya pūrvam vā yat tatra ubhayatra api upayogaḥ na asti iti āha tad niyamasya ca iti
kratu janya apūrva upasthitiḥ hi prakaraṇāt athavā parṇa tā ādi vat avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandhāt vā bhavet
tatra adhyayana vidheḥ an ārabhya adhīta tvena prakaraṇa abhāvaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva

original: arthajñānasya kratuṃ vināpyadhyāpanādidvārā dravyārjane upayogasaṃbhavena avyabhicaritakratusaṃbandho 'pi nasaṃbhavatiṃ ato niyamasya na vidheyatvam
analyzed: artha jñānasya kratum vinā api adhyāpana ādi dvārā dravya arjane upayoga saṃbhavena avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandhaḥ atas niyamasya na vidheya tvam
niyamasya niṣiddha karmaṇi upayoga abhāvāt ca

original: (B1) tanniyamasya cārthajñāne 'nupayogāt avyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhābhāvena kratuṃ yāvadupayogakalpanānupapatteśca na vidheyatvam /
analyzed: tad niyamasya ca artha jñāne na upayogāt avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha abhāvena kratum yāvat upayoga kalpanā anupapatteḥ ca na vidheya tvam
atas svādhyāya vidhinā svarga ādi artham eva adhyayanam vidhīyate
lokataḥ pūrva pravṛtti aṅgīkāreṇa yathā śruta artha jñāna artham vā
adhyayanam eva vā bhāvanāyām bhāvyam astu
na ca evam iṣṭa bhāvyaka tva abhāvāt pravṛtti anupapattiḥ

original: anadhīyānā vrātyā bhavantīti vacanenākaraṇe pratyavāyabodhanenāpi pravṛttisiddheḥ /
analyzed: an adhīyānāḥ vrātyāḥ bhavanti iti vacanena a karaṇe pratyavāya bodhanena api pravṛtti siddheḥ
atas tasya veda tva avacchedena prayojanavat viṣaya tva an ākṣepaka tvāt na arthavādeṣu tad balena
lakṣaṇa ādi siddhi siddhiḥ iti apramāṇam arthavādāḥ dharma adharmayoḥ iti prāpte abhidhīyate
na svādhyāya vidhiḥ svarga ādi artham adhyayanam vidhatte
dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa phala kalpanāyāḥ anyāyya tvāt
na api yathāśruta artha jñāna artham
tathātve vrātya tā bodhaka vākyena adhyayanasya āvaśyaka tvāt gṛhīta pada tad artha saṅgatikasya

original: “sthāṇurayaṃ bhārahāraḥ kilābhūdadhītya vedaṃ na vijānāti yor'tha” mityādi vacanācca
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ ayam bhāra hāraḥ kila abhūt adhītya vedam na vijānāti vacanāt ca
jñānasya api āvaśyaka tvena yathāśruta artha jñānasya ānuṣaṅgika tayā api
svārga ādi artham iti
viśrvajit nayāyena svarga kalpanā apekṣayā rātri satra vat arthavāda abhāve an adhīyānā vrātyā
bhavanti iti smṛti mūla śruti kalpanā lāghava anurodhena vrātya tā parihāra artham eva tat vidhānam astu iti dyotanāya ādi śabdaḥ
na ca adhyayana vidheḥ pūrva upapādita vairūpya āpattiḥ
huṃ phaṭ ādi aṃśe tad adhyayanasya adṛṣṭārtha tāyāḥ tvayā api svīkaraṇīya tvena tad averūpyāya etad artha tva kalpanasya eva ucita tvāt

original: svaśaktyaiva vidhīnāṃ prayojanavadarthapramāpakatvena dharmaprāmāṇyajanakatve 'pi tadadhyayanasyādṛṣṭārthatve 'pi bādhakābhāvāt //
analyzed: sva śaktyā eva vidhīnām prayojana vat artha pramāpaka tvena dharma prāmāṇya janaka tve pi tad adhyayanasya adṛṣṭa artha tve pi bādhaka abhāvāt
adhyayana vidheḥ dṛṣṭārtha tve pya āgraham pratyāham pratyāha lokatas iti

original: lokataḥ pūrvapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ tu pārāyaṇe śūdrānadhikārasiddhiḥ /
anyathā adhyayanaṃ vināpi pārāyaṇasaṃbhavena tadvidhinā tadākṣepaṇe śūdrasyāpyadhikārāpatteḥ,
analyzed: anyathā adhyayanam vinā api pārāyaṇa saṃbhavena tad vidhinā tad ākṣepaṇe śūdrasya api adhikāra āpatteḥ

original: satitvasmin vidhāne etadvidhisiddhādhyayanavata evādhikāriṇo lābhe tadākṣepābhāvānna tasyādhikāraḥ /
analyzed: sati tu asmin vidhāne etad vidhi siddha adhyayanavataḥ eva adhikāriṇaḥ lābhe tad ākṣepa abhāvāt na tasya adhikāraḥ
evam ca eka śākhā pārāyaṇam api upapannam iti
adhyayanam eva vā iti

original: yathāśrutārthajñānāpekṣayā samānapadopāttatvapratyāsattyā tasya bhāvanāyāṃ sannihitatvāt tasyaiva bhāvyatvaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: yathāśruta artha jñāna apekṣayā samāna pada upātta tva pratyāsattyā tasya bhāvanāyām sannihita tvāt tasya eva bhāvya tvam yuktam iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇa ādi siddhiḥ iti
ādi padena ca yathā lakṣaṇāyāḥ asiddhiḥ
tathā lakṣaṇīya arthasya prāśastya aprāśastya ādeḥ api durnirūpa tvāt asiddhiḥ sūcyate
prāśastya aprāśastyayoḥ guṇa doṣavatva rūpatva khaṇḍanam
sa hi na guṇa doṣavatva mātram
atiprasaṅgāt
na tad atiśayau
atiśayasya āpekṣika tvena anavasthita tvāt
arthavāda mātra pratipādyayoḥ guṇa doṣayoḥ anirūpaṇāt ca
viśiṣṭa iṣṭa aniṣṭa phalaka tvasya viśiṣṭa itikartavya tāka tvasya vā vidhi niṣedhābhyām eva pratipanna tvena arthavāda anapekṣa tvāt
na ca iṣṭa aniṣṭa gate phalavat tve guṇa doṣau
tayoḥ api vidhi niṣedhābhyām eva avagamāt
iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhanatvena iva tad gata phalavat tvena api vinā buddhi pūrva kāriṇām pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ abhāvāt
śyena ādi arthavādeṣu tad anupapatteḥ ca
tatra śyena ādeḥ anartha tvena i tad janyasya iṣṭasya aniṣṭāt balavat tva abhāvāt
naca tad tad arthavāda pratipādyasya kṣepiṣṭha tva ādeḥ eva guṇa doṣa tayā prāśastya aprāśastya rūpa tvam
ananugamāt lākṣaṇika tva anupapatteḥ ca

original: tasmāttasya durvacatvādapi tadbodhakatvenāpi nārthavādānāṃ dharmādharmapramāpakatvam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt tasya durvaca tvāt api tad bodhaka tvena api nā arthavādānām dharma adharma pramāpaka tvam iti
adhyayana vidheḥ akṣara avāpti phalaka tva pakṣa upapādanam
etena vrātya tā bodhaka vacanena eva adhyayana vidhi lābhena
syāt etat yadi adhyayana vidheḥ ādau artha jñānam phalam syāt
vaiyarthya āpattyā tad prayojanavat tva ākṣepa paryantam api vyāpāraḥ kalpyet
na ca tad kalpane kiñcid api mānam asti
prāpya karma artha pratyayena phala tayā upanītāyāḥ stobhabhāga adhyayane phala tvena kṷptāyāḥ
artha jñāna prāgbhāvinyāḥ artha jñāna artha tva pakṣe tad nirvāhaka tayā prathamam apekṣitāyāḥ
svādhīna uccāraṇa rūpa akṣara avāpteḥ dṛṣṭāyāḥ eva phala tva saṃbhavena adhyayana vidhi vaiyarthya abhāvāt
astuvai artha jñānam phalam
tadā api artha jñāna artha tvasya anyatas prāptatvena vidheḥ vaiyarthya parihāra artham adhyayana gṛhīta veda artha jñānavatām eva anuṣṭhānam abhyudaya kāri iti evamādi
rūpasya eva niyama phalasya aṅgīkāre adhyayana saṃdhyā vandana ādi anuṣṭhānāt phala anupapattiḥ
tad vidhīnām adhyayanāt prāk upāya antareṇa jñāne dhyayana niyama vidhi atikrama doṣa āpatteḥ
tad ajñāne adhyayana ādiṣu apravṛttyā tad akaraṇa prayukta pratyavāya prasaṅgāt
artha jñāna phalaka adhyayana vidheḥ śūdra adhikāra byāvṛtti prayojana śaṅkā tad samādhānā ati
na ca adhyayana niyamasya adhyayana gṛhīta veda artha jñānavatām eva anuṣṭhānam abhyudaya kāri iti evam na phalam kalpyate
api tu śūdra anadhikāra siddhiḥ
karma vidhayaḥ hi anuṣṭheya artha jñāna vat adhikāri sāpekṣā svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ artha jñāna phalaka tve

original: tadvidhiprāpitānuṣṭheyārthajñāneṣu traivarṇikeṣvevādhikāreṣu labdhānuṣṭhānāṃ na śūdrāṇāṃ jñānamākṣipanti /
analyzed: tad vidhi prāpita anuṣṭheya artha jñāneṣu traivarṇikeṣu eva adhikāreṣu labdha anuṣṭhānām na śūdrāṇām jñānam ākṣipanti

original: tasyārthajñānaphalakatvābhāve tu karmavidhaya eva tadanuṣṭhānamākṣipya tānapyadhikāritvena gṛhṇīyuḥ,
analyzed: tasya artha jñāna phalaka tva abhāve tu karma vidhayaḥ eva tad anuṣṭhānam ākṣipya tān api adhikāri tvena gṛhṇīyuḥ
atas śūdra anadhikāra phalatva siddhiḥ eva artha jñāna artha tve phalam iti yuktam iti vācyam
adhyayana niyama sadbhāve pi śūdra adhikāra āpatteḥ anivārya tvāt
traivarṇikānām api svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti pitṛ pitāmaha ādi paraṃparā gata sva śākhā mātra
eva adhyayanasya vihita tvena śākhā antara āgata aṅga mantra upasaṃhāreṇa karma anuṣṭhāna arthe kratu vidhibhiḥ
śākhā antara rāmnāta mātra gocaram iti ākṣepa lāghavāt karma vidhayaḥ traivarṇikān eva adhikuryuḥ na
śūdram iti vācyam

original: evaṃ tarhi yasya karmaṇo yasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ bhūyasāmaṅgānāṃ ca vidhānaṃ 'bhūyastvenobhūyaśrutī' tinyāyena pradhānasyāpi tatra vidhānaṃ,
analyzed: evam tarhi yasya karmaṇaḥ yasyām śākhāyām bhūyasām aṅgānām ca vidhānam bhūyas tvena ubhūya śrutī ti nyāyena pradhānasya api tatra vidhānam
śākhā antare tu su alpa aṅga vidhānam
tatra karmaṇi tad śākhā adhyāyinaḥ eva adhikāra āpatteḥ
atas trevarṇikānām artha jñāna ākṣepa avaśyaṃbhāvāt śūdra anadhikāre tasya veda tad artha grahaṇāya anuṣṭhāna niṣedha
eva hetuḥ vācyaḥ iti na asau artha jñāna phalakasya adhyayana niyama vidheḥ phalam iti akṣara avāpteḥ eva
tad phala tvam yuktam āśrayitum
siddheḥ svādhyāya vidhi vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
etena adhyayana bhāvyaka tva pakṣaḥ api nirastaḥ
atas vaiyarthya parihāra artham prayojanavat artha jñāna uddeśena
naca śabdānām artha para tvasya viśiṣṭa artha pratīti uddeśyaka uccāraṇa adhīna tvam loke sarvatra

original: kḷptamiti vede 'pyarthaparatvārthe arthāvabodhoddeśyakoccāraṇākṣepeṇa loka iva rāgaprayuktasya
analyzed: kḷptam iti vede pi artha paratva arthe artha avabodha uddeśyaka uccāraṇa ākṣepeṇa loke iva rāga prayuktasya
tasya asaṃbhavāt adhyayana vidhi atiriktasya vidhi antarasya adarśanāt artha jñāna mūlaka svādhyāya viṣaya guru uñcāraṇa anūñcāraṇa ātmaka adhyayana vidhi bodhitam eva uñcāraṇam

original: samarpaṇīya- mityavaśyamarthajñānameva phalaṃ kalpanīyamiti madabhihitameva yuktamiti - vācyam ;
analyzed: samarpaṇīyam iti avaśyam artha jñānam eva phalam kalpanīyam iti mad abhihitam eva yuktam iti vācyam

original: viśiṣṭārthāvabodhoddeśyakoñcāraṇasyārthaparatvaprayojakatve mauninā likhitvā datte pareṇāpyekenaiva likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā manasānusaṃhite śrlokādau  #
analyzed: viśiṣṭa artha avabodha uddeśyaka uñcāraṇasya artha paratva prayojaka tve mauninā likhitvā datte pareṇa api ekena eva likhitam dṛṣṭvā manasā anusaṃhite
uñcāraṇa abhāvena artha paratva anāpatteḥ
atha api viśiṣṭa artha pratīti uddeśyaka vyāpāra tvam eva artha tātparya nirṇaye prayojakam

original: mauniśrloke ca likhitvā dānarūpa eva vyāpārastatprayojakaḥ,
analyzed: ca likhitvā dāna rūpaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ tad prayojakaḥ
vede ca apauruṣeye kartṛ vyāpāra abhāvāt tad anukūla vyāpāraḥ dhī ayana rūpāt uñcāraṇāt anyaḥ
na saṃbhavati iti tasya arthavatva nirvāha artham adhyayana vidheḥ artha jñāna phalaka tvam avaśyam āstheyam iti ucyeta

original: yadi śabdabodhatvāvacchinnaṃ prati tātparyajñānasya kāraṇatvaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi śabda bodha tva avacchinnam prati tātparya jñānasya kāraṇa tvam syāt

atas na eka artha bodhaka pada janya śābdabodha tva avacchinne eva tasya kāraṇa tvam

original: śābdabodhatvāvacchinnaṃ pratyapi vā kāraṇatve śukādivākyasthale śabdagatameva tātparye kalpanīyam,
analyzed: śābda bodha tva avacchinnam prati api vā kāraṇatve śuka ādi vākya sthale śabda gatam eva tātparye kalpanīyam
tathā eva vede pi iti na adhyayana vidhi siddha vyāpāra apekṣā
śabda svabhāvena eva tātparī anumāya artha para tva upapatteḥ

original: tathāpi adhyayanādanyaḥ kṛtsnasvādhyāyārthapratītyuddeśenādhyayanānantaraṃ kartavyo vicāra eva tatprayojako 'stu /
analyzed: tathā api adhyayanāt anyaḥ kṛtsna svādhyāya artha pratīti uddeśena adhyayana anantaram kartavyaḥ vicāraḥ eva tad prayojakaḥ astu

original: nahi vicāraṃ vinā kasyāpi kratūpāsanopayukto vedārthanirṇaya saṃbhavati /

atas tasya eva vedānām ārtha paratve prayojaka tva upapattau na adhyayanasya tad prayojaka tva nirvāha artham
tavya pratyaya svārasya ādi prāptām akṣara avāptim atilaṅghya artha jñānasya api tad phala tvam kalpanīyam iti āśaṅkā nivṛtti phalakam
siddhānti abhimatam vākya arthe varṇayati atas vaiyarthya parihāra artham iti

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - satyaṃ śukādivākyārthapratītyarthaṃ śabdagatameva tātparyamaṅgīkartavyam ;
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ satyam śuka ādi vākya artha pratīti artham śabda gatam eva tātparyam aṅgīkartavyam

original: tathāpi upakramopasaṃhāramadhyaparāmarśairitthameva śabdasya tātparyamityayaṃ nirṇayastu vede adhyayanādinaiveti tadvidhireva tatra nirṇāyakaḥ
analyzed: tathā api upakrama upasaṃhāra madhya parāmarśaiḥ ittham eva śabdasya tātparyam iti ayam nirṇayaḥ tu vede adhyayana ādinā evā iti tad vidhiḥ eva tatra nirṇāyakaḥ
sva icchayā hi veda vākyāni paṭhatā aṅga vākyeṣu api phala padam uñcāryeta

original: yo 'dhvaryuḥ sa hotā ye tvijaste yajamānāśrcetyādyapyarthapratītiḥ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ dhvaryuḥ sa hotā ye tvijaḥ te yajamānāḥ ca ityādi api artha pratītiḥ syāt

original: naca adhyayanānantaraṃ kriyamāṇo vicāra eva tannirṇāyakaḥ,
analyzed: na ca adhyayana anantaram kriyamāṇaḥ vicāraḥ eva tad nirṇāyakaḥ
adhyayanasya artha jñāna artha tva abhāve vicāra kartavya tā ākṣepasya eva abhāvāt vicārasya eva aprāpteḥ
naca adhyayana saṃskṛta svādhyāyasya upayoga apekṣāyām svādhyāyasya artha jñāna janaka tva rūpa liṅga kalpya śrutyā artha jñāne

original: viniyogakalpanāt tasya ca vicāramantareṇānupapatteḥ vicāraprāptiriti - vācyam ;
analyzed: viniyoga kalpanāt tasya ca vicāram antareṇa anupapatteḥ vicāra prāptiḥ iti vācyam
adhyayana saṃskṛtasya svādhyāyasya artha jñāna artha tva viniyoga kalpanāyāḥ pūrvam eva pārāyaṇa ādi viniyoga vidhinā nairākāṅykṣeṇa liṅga kalpya śruteḥ aprasarāt

original: liṅgasya ca yathāśrutārthajñānajanakatva eva darśanāt tatkalpyaśrutyā api tadarthasyaivāpattau tatra vicārasāpekṣatvābhāvāñca,
analyzed: liṅgasya ca yathāśruta artha jñāna janaka tve eva darśanāt tad kalpya śrutyāḥ api tad arthasya eva āpattau tatra vicāra sāpekṣa tva abhāvāt ca
huṃ phaṭ ādi aṃśe svādhyāyasya artha jñāna janaka tva abhāvena tad janaka tva sāmarthyasya vyabhicāra grasta tvāt ca

original: kiñca akṣarāvāpteḥ svata apuruṣārthāyāḥ phalatvānupapattyā arthajñānasādhanatvaveṣeṇa
analyzed: kiñca akṣara avāpteḥ svatas apuruṣa arthāyāḥ phala tva anupapattyā artha jñāna sādhana tva veṣeṇa
tad upapādane artha jñānasya api svatas puruṣa artha tva anupapatteḥ tulya tvāt karma anuṣṭhāna aupayika artha jñāna sādhana tva veṣeṇa eva
tasya phala tvam svīkāryam

original: nahi svādhyāyākṣarāṇāṃ arthajñānadvārā karmānuṣṭhānopayogitvena puruṣārthaparyavasāyitvaṃ liṅgamātreṇa śakyaṃ vijñātum ;
analyzed: nahi svādhyāya akṣarāṇām artha jñāna dvārā karma anuṣṭhāna upayogi tvena puruṣa artha paryavasāyi tvam liṅga mātreṇa śakyam vijñātum
huṃ phaṭ arthavāda ādi akṣarebhyaḥ ṛtha jñāna anutpatteḥ
kebhyaḥ cit tad akṣarebhyaḥ ṛtha jñāna utpattau api vyabhicārāt
tatra ca tasya sāmānya saṃbandha kāri pramāṇa sāpekṣa tvāt

original: ataśrcāntato gatvā karmānuṣṭhānaupayikārthajñāne svādhyāyākṣaragrahaṇasyāvaśyakalpanīye upayoge lāghavāt tasyaiva phalatvaṃ kalpyatāṃ,
analyzed: atas rca antatas gatvā karma anuṣṭhāna aupayika artha jñāne svādhyāya akṣara grahaṇasya avaśya kalpanīye upayoge lāghavāt tasya eva phala tvam kalpyatām
na tu anantara dṛṣṭa tva mātreṇa akṣara avāpteḥ
sākṣāt praṇālī sādhāraṇa puruṣa artha mātrasya eva vihita phala tva yogyatayā jñātasya eva anvaya bodha upayogi tvāt
artha jñānasya tu tena vinā katham api karma anuṣṭhāna asaṃbhavāt liṅgena eva aupaniṣadasya

original: mantrāṇāṃ dharmādharmayoḥ prāmāṇyamasti na veti cintāyāṃ na tāvadvidhitvena prāmāṇyam;
analyzed: mantrāṇām dharma adharmayoḥ prāmāṇyam asti na vā iti cintāyām na tāvat vidhi tvena prāmāṇyam
tasya dvitīye nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt
nā api stāvaka tvena arthavāda vat
teṣām hi sannihitena vidhinā pada eka vākya tva ādi uktam sva samarpita prāśastya anvita bhāvanā viṣayaka śābda pramā janaka tvam

original: mantrāṇāṃ tu dūrasthatvena padaikavākyatvānupapatterna tadvidhayā prāmāṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: mantrāṇām tu dūra stha tvena pada eka vākya tva anupapatteḥ na tad vidhayā prāmāṇya saṃbhavaḥ
na api prāśastyam svātantryeṇa vākya arthaḥ
padārtha vidhayā upasthita tvāt
nā api artha smāraka tvena prāmāṇyam
anadhigata artha bodhaka tva abhāvena tad asaṃbhavāt
sāma mantrāṇām artha abhāvena yāthārthyasya api anupapatteḥ ca
na ca prāmāṇya abhāve smāraka tva ādinā prayojanavat va mātra aṅgīkāraḥ
dhyāna ādi upāya antareṇa api smṛti siddheḥ niyata mantra āmnāna vaiyartyāt
prayoga asamaveta artha smārakeṣu samṛti vaiyarthyāt ca
atas dhikāra ākhya prakaraṇa ādinā apagata tad tad kratu aṅga bhāvānām mantrāṇām uccāraṇa mātram ad daṣṭa artham vidhīyate

original: svādhyāyavidhiśvoccāraṇopayogiprayāgaprāśubhāvaphalakatayaivādhyayanaṃ vidhatte iti na kaśviddoṣaḥ iti prāpte--- ( B2)
analyzed: svādhyāya vidhi śva uccāraṇa upayogi prayāga prāśu bhāva phalaka tayā eva adhyayanam vidhatte iti na kaścid doṣaḥ iti prāpte
mantrāṇām iti mūla avataraṇam
veda avayava bhūtānām codanānām ādya pādena dharma prāmāṇyam prasādhya tad avayava tvena upasthitānām
mantra arthavādānām arthavādānām mantra apekṣayā antaraṅga tvena iha pāda ādya adhikaraṇe tatra
prāmāṇyam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām uktavā tathā eva upasthitānām mantrāṇām tatra prāmāṇyam
cinyate iti abhipretya āha mantrāṇām iti
nāmadheya pādāt pūrvam arthavāda pāda pravṛci upapatti nirūpaṇam
yadi api arthavādataḥ pi antaraṅga tā vidhau nāmadheyasya

original: kimu vaktavyaṃ mantrebhya iti tataḥ pūrvaṃ tatprāmāṇyacintā yuktā kartum;
analyzed: kimu vaktavyam mantrebhyaḥ iti tatas pūrvam tad prāmāṇya cintā yuktā kartum
tathā api śyena agnihotra ādi padeṣu nāma tvasya arthavāda upātta upamāna adhīna tvāt mantra gata tad prakhya nyāya adhīna tvāt ca

original: tatprāmāṇyopajīvitvāvagateḥ tataḥ pūrvaṃ etatprāmāṇyasādhanaṃ yuktameveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tad prāmāṇya upajīvi tva avagateḥ tatas pūrvam etat prāmāṇya sādhanam yuktam eva iti bhāvaḥ
veda avayava bhūtānām prakāra dvayena tad prāmāṇyam sādhitam

original: tasya cehāsaṃbhavāt anyatropalabdhaprakārāntarāsaṃbhavāt aprāmāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣayituṃ uktaprakāradvayāsaṃbhavamupapādayati---- na tā vaditi //
analyzed: tasya ca iha asaṃbhavāt anyatra upalabdha prakāra antara asaṃbhavāt aprāmāṇyam pūrvapakṣayitum ukta prakāra dvaya asaṃbhavam upapādayati na tāḥ vat iti
dvitīyaḥ iti
yad śabda āmantraṇa uttama puruṣa ghaṭiteṣu teṣu yad śabda ādibhiḥ vidhi śakti pratibandhāt na
vidhāyaka tvam iti evam dvitīye bhāva artha pāde vidhi mantrayoḥ aikārthyam eka śabdāt iti adhikaraṇe
nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ
stāvaka tvena prāmāṇyam dvedhā
pada ekavākyatayā vākya ekavākyatayā vā
tatra ādyam dūṣayati teṣām iti
anena ca arthavāda prāmāṇya sādhaka hetu asaṃbhaveta pūrvapakṣa karaṇāt pratyudāharaṇa ātmikā saṃgatiḥ sūcitā
prakaraṇa antara tvāt anantara saṃgati abhāve pi na
dvitīyam dūṣayati na api iti
padārtha vidhayā iti
aneka padārtha anvita eka viśeṣya tā śālī hi vākya arthaḥ bhavati

original: tasmiṃśca svārthe samāptānāṃ vākyānāṃ itaravākyenānvaye vākyaikavākyatā bhavati /
analyzed: tasmin ca sva arthe samāptānām vākyānām itara vākyena anvaye vākya ekavākya tā bhavati
yathā aṅga pradhāna vākyānām

original: prakṛte tu prāśastyasya lakṣaṇayā bodhe 'pi itarānvitatvenābodhāt tasmiṃścārthe samāptatvābhāvāt na sā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛte tu prāśastyasya lakṣaṇayā bodhe pi itara anvita tvena ābodhāt tasmin ca arthe samāpta tva abhāvāt na sā saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ
siddhānta yuktim anūdya nirākaroti nā api iti
mantra āmnāna vaiyaryyāt iti
vācaka mantra śabda smaraṇasya artha smaraṇa adhīna tvāt ca iti athraḥ
prayoga asamavetā iti

original: protsāhanānumantraṇādimantrāṇāṃ karmasamavetārthābhidhāyitve 'pi prayoge 'nuṣṭheyārthakatvānna tatra smaraṇasyopayoga iti na tatprayojakatvamapi  #
analyzed: protsāhana anumantraṇa ādi mantrāṇām karma samaveta artha abhidhāyi tve pi prayoge nuṣṭheya arthaka tvāt na tatra smaraṇasya upayogaḥ iti na tad prayojaka tvam api
yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
uccāraṇa dvārā mantrāṇām kratau upayoga nirūpaṇam
atas smāraka tvena upayoga asaṃbhavāt adhyayana saṃskṛtānām eṣām upayoga apekṣāyām prakaraṇa paṭhitānām an ārabhya adhītānām
ca yathāsaṃbhavam śruti vākya adhikāra ākhya prakaraṇa krama samākhyā ādibhiḥ pradhāna aṅga tvena avagatānām
pradhāna vidhinā mantra svarūpam eva aṅgīkriyate
na tu brāhmaṇa vākya vat arthaḥ pi
anupayogāt

original: yadyapi mantrasya svarūpeṇa na pradhānopakāritvaṃ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: yadi api mantrasya sva rūpeṇa na pradhāna upakāri tvam saṃbhavati
tathā api pramāṇa avagata mantra svarūpa aṅgatva nirvāhāya uccāraṇa kriyā dvāreṇa kāraka tvena ca ṅgīkriyate
na hi artha pratyāyanasya puruṣa kṛtya sādhyasya vyāpāra tvam saṃbhavati
atas uccāraṇam eva vyāpāraḥ

original: tasya ca dṛṣṭaprayojanāsaṃbhave paraṃ adṛṣṭārthatvaṃ mantraniyamasya siddhānte ivetyabhipretyapūrvapakṣe phalitamāha ----- ata iti //
analyzed: tasya ca dṛṣṭa prayojana asaṃbhave param adṛṣṭa artha tvam mantra niyamasya siddhānte iva iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣe phalitam āha atas iti
svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi avagata dṛṣṭārtha tā bhaṅgam pariharati svādhyāya iti
kratu an apekṣitasya mantra aniṣṭhasya uccāraṇasya vyāpāra tva asaṃbhavena artha pratyāyanasya eva tattvena ca siddhānta upakramaḥ

original: yadyapi uccāraṇaṃ prati viṣayatāsaṃbandhena mantrāṇāṃ kāraṇatvāt tajjanyatvena tasya vyāpāratvaṃ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: yadi api uccāraṇam prati viṣayatā saṃbandhena mantrāṇām kāraṇa tvāt tad janya tvena tasya vyāpāra tvam saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi tasya kratvanapekṣitatvena adṛṣṭārthatvakalpanāpekṣayā dṛṣṭameva padārthābhidhānasya karmānaupāyikatayā sāmarthyāt vākyārthābhidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api tasya kratu anapekṣita tvena adṛṣṭa artha tva kalpanā apekṣayā dṛṣṭam eva padārtha abhidhānasya karma anaupāyika tayā sāmarthyāt vākya artha abhidhānam
vyāpāra tvena kalpayitum ucitam

original: uccāraṇasya puṃvyāpāratvena mantraniṣṭhatvābhāvādityabhipretya siddhāntamāha --- dṛṣṭe iti //
analyzed: uccāraṇasya puṃs vyāpāra tvena mantra niṣṭhatva abhāvāt iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha dṛṣṭe iti
anuṣṭheya artha pratipādakānām mantrāṇām tāvat anuṣṭhāna hetu bhūta smṛti janaka tvāt artha abhidhāna dvārā pradhāna upakāri tvam iti āha prayoga samaveta iti
saṃbhavatām iti
ananvita tayā svarūpa mātreṇa pada śakti adhīna jñāna viṣaya tvāt
abhidhīyate

original: dṛṣṭe sambhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanānupapatteḥ prayogasamavetārthasmṛtireva saṃbhavatāṃ mantrāṇāṃ prayojanam,
analyzed: dṛṣṭe sambhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā anupapatteḥ prayoga samaveta artha smṛtiḥ eva saṃbhavatām mantrāṇām prayojanam
asaṃbhavatām tu kāmam bhavatu adṛṣṭam prayojanam
śakyate tu tatra api mantrāḥ artha prakāśana arthāḥ
prakāśanam parama dṛṣṭārtham iti vaktum
sāmnā tu akṣara abhivyaktiḥ eva dṛṣṭam prayojanam artha abhāve pi avyāhatam
anṛk sāmnām tu adṛṣṭa artha tvam eva iti anyatra vistaraḥ
na tu etāvatā sarvatra eva adṛṣṭa artha tvam
na ca mantrāṇām niyamena pāṭha vaiyarthyam
tad balena mantraiḥ eva smartavyam iti niyama kalpanāt
tasya ca adṛṣṭa phalaka tve pi na doṣaḥ

original: na ca---- evaṃ sāmarthyādeva tatra tatra mantrāṇāṃ viniyogasiddhau punasteṣāṃ kvacidviniyogakaraṇaṃ vyarthamiti ---- vācyam; ( B2)
analyzed: na ca evam sāmarthyāt eva tatra tatra mantrāṇām viniyoga siddhau punar teṣām kvacid viniyoga karaṇam vyartham iti vācyam
iti karaṇa viniyukta anumantraṇa phala mantrāṇām dṛṣṭa vidhayā prayoga samavāya nirūpaṇam
karaṇa mantrāṇām iti arthaḥ
yatra api mantrāt svarasataḥ na anuṣṭheya artha avagatiḥ

original: itikaraṇādinā ca mantro viniyujyate “iṣetveti śākhāṃ chinattī” tyādau tatrāpi arthābhidhānaṃ
analyzed: iti karaṇa ādinā ca mantraḥ viniyujyate iṣā itvā iti śākhām chinatti tyādau tatra api artha abhidhānam
vinā dṛṣṭa vidhayā anya dvārā kāraṇatva asaṃbhavāt adhyāhāra ādinā api artha abhidhānasya eva vyāpāra tvam
kriyamāṇa anuvādiṣu ityādiṣu artha abhidhānam na karma vidhi apekṣitam
karmaṇaḥ upakrānta tvena eva smṛta tvena tad vaiyarthyāt

original: tathāpi yūpaparivyāṇādikriyāyā anekakṣaṇavyāsaktatayā kadācinmadhye 'pi buddhivicchedesati smṛtidārḍhyārthaṃ tadapekṣopapatterdṛṣṭavidhayaivopayoga  #
analyzed: tathā api yūpa parivyāṇa ādi kriyāyāḥ aneka kṣaṇa vyāsakta tayā kadācid madhye buddhi vicchede sati smṛti dārḍhya artham tad apekṣā upapatteḥ dṛṣṭa vidhayā eva upayoga
na a sulabhaḥ
yatra api abhrayā dāna ādau mantrāṇām samuccayaḥ
tatra api ekena eva smṛti siddheḥ itara vaiyarthyam dvādaśe japa mantra ādi rītyā parihariṣyate
ye pi ananuṣṭheya karma samaveta artha abhidhāyakāḥ aganma suvar ityādayaḥ protsāna mantrāḥ

original: teṣāmapi śraddhājananārthamananuṣṭheyasyāpi karmasamavetaphalādeḥ smṛteḥ śraddhātiśayo jāyate iti tadarthatvena dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: teṣām api śraddhā janana artham ananuṣṭheyasya api karma samaveta phala ādeḥ smṛteḥ śraddhā atiśayaḥ jāyate iti tad artha tvena dṛṣṭārtha tvam jñeyam

original: anumantraṇamantrāṇāṃ akṛtatvaśaṅkāparihārāya smṛtidāḍharyārthaṃ tadapekṣopapatteḥ yuktameva tadarthatvam /
analyzed: anumantraṇa mantrāṇām akṛta tva śaṅkā parihārāya smṛti dāḍharya artham tad apekṣā upapatteḥ yuktam eva tad artha tvam

original: yattu anumantraṇamantrāṇāmadṛṣṭārthatvena samuccayābhidhānaṃ tantraratne pañcame tadayuktamiti tatraiva vakṣyate /
analyzed: yat tu anumantraṇa mantrāṇām adṛṣṭa artha tvena samuccaya abhidhānam tantraratne pañcame tat ayuktam iti tatra eva vakṣyate
kaustubhe ca atra draṣṭavyam
asaṃbhavat dṛṣṭa arthānām adṛṣṭa artha tva aṅgīkāraḥ
dhuṅśva pūṅśva iti japa mantreṣu dṛṣṭa prayojana asaṃbhavāt adṛṣṭa artha tvam iti āha asaṃbhavatām iti

original: ““mantro hīnaḥ kharato varṇato vā mithyā prayukto na tamarthamāha'' ityādiliṅgadarśanāt
analyzed: mantraḥ hīnaḥ kharataḥ varṇataḥ vā mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam artham āha ityādi liṅga darśanāt
khara yukta japa ādi mantrāṇām api karaṇa mantra vat artha abhidhāyaka tva avagateḥ nirukta vyākaraṇa ādinā
teṣām artha bodhaka tva upapatteḥ prakāśanasya karma anuṣṭhāna anaupayika tvāt dṛṣṭa smṛti rūpa prayojana artha tva asaṃbhave
kāmam adṛṣṭa artha tvam api iti pakṣa antaram āha śakyate tu iti
evam sthite yat dvādaśe japa ādi mantrāṇām ajṛṣṭa artha tvam uktam
tad mantra sādhyārtha abhidhānasya adṛṣṭa artha tva abhiprāyāt iti bhāvaḥ
sāmnām dṛṣṭa artha tva nirūpaṇam

original: sāmamantrāṇāṃ gītyātmakatvenārthābāvāt tadabhidhānadvārā upayogāsaṃbhave 'pi ṝgakṣarābhivyaktyarthatvaṃ navame yannirūpayiṣyate tadeva dṛṣṭaṃ  #
analyzed: sāma mantrāṇām gīti ātmaka tvena artha abāvāt tad abhidhāna dvārā upayoga asaṃbhave pi ṝgakṣara abhivyakti artha tvam navame yat nirūpayiṣyate tat eva dṛṣṭam
prayojanam iti āha sāmnā antu iti
anuksāmnām adṛṣṭa artha tva nirūpaṇam
yāni tu stobha akṣara adhirūḍhāni teṣām ṛk akṣara abhivyakti arthatva abhāvāt adṛṣṭa artha tvam eva
atas eva rathantara ādi sāmnām āśrayi karma tvam iti api draṣṭavyam
yāni tu a nṛk sāmāni prajāpati hṛdaya ādīni

original: teṣāṃ stobhākṣarādhirūḍhatvāt stobhānāṃ cārthaśūnyatvasya navame vakṣyamāṇatvāt nārthābhidhānarūpastotrakaraṇatvaṃ
analyzed: teṣām stobha akṣara adhirūḍha tvāt stobhānām ca artha śūnyatvasya navame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na artha abhidhāna rūpa stotra karaṇa tvam
iti agatyā sāma viniyoga anurodhena uccāraṇa mātra dvārā adṛṣṭārtha tvam eva iti āha anuksāmnā antu iti
prayoga pratyāyana artha tvena an ṛk sāmnām upayoga nirākaraṇam

original: yattu bhāṭṭālaṅkārakṛtā anṛksāmnāṃ yatra karmaṇi tāni viniyuktāni tadapūrveṇāpekṣitasya
analyzed: yat tu bhāṭṭa alaṅkāra kṛtā an ṛk sāmnām yatra karmaṇi tāni viniyuktāni tat apūrveṇa apekṣitasya
sva viśiṣṭa tvena prayoga vidhi prayoga pratyāyanasya taiḥ api saṃpādanāt artha pratyāyana artha tvam uktam
tat eva rūpam ādāya anyatra api tasya eva prayojana tva āpatteḥ upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ

original: (mantrāṇāṃ prayogasamavetasmārakatvapakṣe tāṃ caturbhiḥ imāmagṛbhṇan uruprathasvetyādiviyogavaiyarthyanirūpaṇam) na doṣa iti //
analyzed: mantrāṇām prayoga samaveta smāraka tva pakṣe tām caturbhiḥ imām agṛbhṇan uru prathasva ityādi viyoga vaiyarthya nirūpaṇam na doṣaḥ iti
naca āvaśyaka adṛṣṭa kalpanā prāthamya āvaśyaka tva ādinā uccāraṇāt eva yuktā iti vācyam
dṛṣṭena nirākāṅkṣasya adṛṣṭa kalpanā nimitta bhūta ākāṅkṣā abhāve prāthamya ādi mātrasya aprayojaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
kvacid viniyoga karaṇam iti

original: yathā ““tāṃ caturbhirādatte'' ““ityaśvābhidhānīmādatte'' ““uruprathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati'' ityādayo viniyogavidhayaḥ teṣāṃvaiyarthyamityarthaḥ
analyzed: yathā tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti aśva abhidhānīm ādatte uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati ityādayaḥ viniyoga vidhayaḥ teṣām vaiyarthyam iti arthaḥ
ādye tāvat cayana sādhanībhūta iṣṭakā sidhi artham āvaśyaka tayā prāptasya bhṛt rahaṇasya
khanana dvāra rūpa abhri ādāne devasya tvā savituḥ ityādi āmnātānām caturṇam mantrāṇam artha prakāśaka tva rūpa liṅga kalpya śrutyā eva
mantra viniyoga prāptau tad vidhi vaiyarthyam
dvitīye tasyāḥ mṛdoḥ śva gardabha upari ānayana ārtam tayoḥ bandhana artha raśāna ādāne artha prāpte
imām agṛbhṇan iti mantrasya liṅga kalpya śrutyā gardabha raśanā dāne iva aśva raśanā dāne
pi prāpteḥ tad vidhi vaiyarthyam

original: tṛtīye puroḍāśe aṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtatvārthaprāpte prathane mantrasya liṅgakalpyaśrutyaiva prāptestadvidhivaiyarthyam /
analyzed: tṛtīye puroḍāśe aṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛta tva artha prāpte prathane mantrasya liṅga kalpya śrutyā eva prāpteḥ tad vidhi vaiyarthyam

original: mantrāṇāmadṛṣṭārthatve tu yatra kutrāpyuccāraṇe prāpte tatra liṅgenāviniyuktānāṃ viniyojakatayoccāraṇaniyamārthatvena sārthakyamityāśaṅkāgranthārthaḥ
analyzed: mantrāṇām adṛṣṭa artha tve tu yatra kutra api uccāraṇe prāpte tatra liṅgena aviniyuktānām viniyojaka tayā uccāraṇa niyama ārthatvena sārthakyam iti āśaṅkā grantha arthaḥ
karaṇam vyartham iti vācyam
guṇa parisaṅkhyā ādi artha tvena sārthakyāt

original: tathāhi---arthaprāpte abhryādāne vikalpena caturṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ liṅgena prāpsyamānānāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi artha prāpte abhri ādāne vikalpena caturṇām mantrāṇām liṅgena prāpsyamānānām

original: prāpakapramāṇāt pūrvameva pravṛttena tāṃ caturbhirādatte iti vacanena mantrasaṅkhyobhayaviśiṣṭādānabhāvanāyāṃ

idam ākūtam katham iti prakāra ākhyaḥ yāga gata vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ upekṣitaḥ

original: tena yaḥ prakāraviśeṣasamarpakaḥ śabdaḥ sa eva tadākāṅkṣāpūraṇenaikavākyatāmupagantumalam nānyat /
analyzed: tena yaḥ prakāra viśeṣa samarpakaḥ śabdaḥ saḥ eva tad ākāṅkṣā pūraṇena ekavākya tām upagantum alam na anyat
na ca kriyāntaram sva rūpeṇa eva kriyā antargata vyāpāraḥ bhavati
prakāra saṃpādanam tu tad gata vyāpāraḥ syāt

original: na hi kriyayoḥ svarūpeṇa saṃbhavati saṃbandhaḥ,
analyzed: na hi kriyayoḥ svarūpeṇa saṃbhavati saṃbandhaḥ
kintu dvāra viśeṣam āśritya
na ca upahoma ādiṣu kḷptam dvāram asti
yena yāga gata vyāpāra tām aśrnuvīran

original: prakṛtivacchabdastu prākṛtasāṅgāvāntarakāryasaṃpādanākhyaṃ prakāraṃ pratipādayan ekavākyatāṃ sukhenayāti /
analyzed: prakṛtivat śabdaḥ tu prākṛta sa aṅga avāntarakārya saṃpādana ākhyam prakāram pratipādayan ekavākya tām sukhena yāti

original: paścāttu sannihitāmnānānarthakyāt dvārakalpanayā tairapi ekavākyatā bhavati /
analyzed: paścāt tu sannihita āmnāna ānarthakyāt dvāra kalpanayā taiḥ api ekavākyatā bhavati
yat tu ājyabhāga ādikam prākṛtam aṅgam

original: tatprakṛtāveva labdhvā avāntaropakāraṃ tata eva labdhapradhānasaṃbandhaṃ vikṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ lakṣaṇayā svīyāvāntarakāryasaṃpādanākhyaṃ prākṛtaprakāramupasthāpayati
analyzed: tad prakṛtau eva labdhvā avāntara upakāram tatas eva labdha pradhāna saṃbandham vikṛtau śrūyamāṇam lakṣaṇayā svīya avāntara kārya saṃpādana ākhyam prākṛta prakāram upasthāpayati
tad lakṣaṇa artham ca idam ājyabhāgau yajati iti vacanam
svarūpa paratve ānarthakya āpatteḥ

original: tallakṣaṇayā tu śaknoti pradhānakathaṃbhāvapūṇena tadekavākyatāṃ gantum /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇayā tu śaknoti pradhāna kathaṃbhāva pūṇena tad ekavākya tām gantum

original: tena ca pūrṇe kathaṃbhāve nairākāṅkṣyādhīnātmalābhaścodako lupyate ityapūrvatvamiti /
analyzed: tena ca pūrṇe kathaṃbhāve nairākāṅkṣya adhīna ātmalābhaḥ codakaḥ lupyate iti apūrva tvam iti

original: anena copahomavailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayatā kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣāpūraṇasamarthaśabdena pradhānaikavākyatāsaṃbhavopapādanārthaṃ ājyabhāgapadena kevalaṃ  #
analyzed: anena ca upahoma vailakṣaṇyam darśayatā kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā pūraṇa samartha śabdena pradhāna eka vākyatā saṃbhava upapādana artham ājyabhāga padena kevalam
na kriyā svarūpa vidhānam
apitu lakṣaṇayā sva janya prakāra saṃpādana ākhya vyāpāra viśeṣasya prakṛtau avagatasya vidhānam

original: upahome tu tādṛśaprakārasaṃpādanatya pūrvamanavagatasya naiva lakṣaṇā saṃbhavatīti
analyzed: upahome tu pūrvam anavagatasya na eva lakṣaṇā saṃbhavati iti
na lakṣaṇayā api upahoma vidhiḥ ekavākya tām upagantum alam iti uktam saṃbhavati iti kutra itara aṅga janya karaṇa upakāra lakṣaṇā
pūrva likhita śāstradīpikā granthe ājyabhāga gatam eva yat svāpūrva dvāreṇa yāga gata vyāpāra rūpam asti

original: tatraiva lakṣaṇeti pratīyata iti madgatāpītīyaṃ granthavyākhyānabhrāntirbhavatīti na khedayecceta ājyabhāgajanyaprakāravidhāne /
analyzed: tatra eva lakṣaṇā iti pratīyate iti mad gatā api iti iyam grantha vyākhyāna bhrāntiḥ bhavati iti na khedayet cetaḥ ājyabhāga janya prakāra vidhāne
yat tu vidhi vaiyarthyam

original: tattu apūrvatāpratipādakapūrvatanagranthena parisaṅkhyāṅgīkāreṇa prāgeva tantraratne parihṛtam //
analyzed: tat tu apūrva tā pratipādaka pūrvatana granthena parisaṅkhyā aṅgīkāreṇa prāk eva tantraratne parihṛtam

original: kiñca. etādṛśaparārthalakṣaṇāyāṃ pañcamapakṣa iva svārthahāniparārthakalpane kathaṃ nāpadyetām ?
analyzed: kiñca etādṛśa parārtha lakṣaṇāyām pañcama pakṣe iva svārtha hāni parārtha kalpane katham nā āpadyetām
apica itara aṅga janya upakāra ārthatve ājyabhāgayoḥ aprākṛta kārya arthatva āpatteḥ tad aṅgīkāreṇa

original: apūrvavidhitvāpekṣayā svopakāraviśiṣṭānāmeva vidhimaṅgīkṛtya phalataḥ parisaṅkhyātvameva yuktamāśrayitum /
analyzed: apūrva vidhi tva apekṣayā sva upakāra viśiṣṭānām eva vidhim aṅgīkṛtya phalataḥ parisaṅkhyā tvam eva yuktam āśrayitum
api ca itara aṅga janya upakāra artha tvena ājyabhāga vidhāne pi ākāṅkṣā adhīna ātmalābha codaka lopaḥ ākāṅkṣā ucchedāt eva vācyaḥ
anyathā samuccayena itara aṅgānām anuṣṭhāna āpatteḥ anivārya tvāt
tādṛśasya ākāṅkṣā ucchedasya sva upakāra viśiṣṭa ājyabhāga mātra vidhinā eva siddheḥ nirarthakam eva tāvat paryanta lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam

original: ata eva tato 'pi yāvaduktamityuttarādhikaraṇe bahuṣu prākṛteṣu śruteṣu ekaikasyaiva
analyzed: atas eva yāvat uktam iti uttara adhikaraṇe bahuṣu prākṛteṣu śruteṣu ekaikasya eva

original: kḷptopakārakatvena pradhānākāṅkṣāpūraṇe sāmarthyāt vikalpaṃ manyata iti tantraratnādigrantheṣu
analyzed: kḷpta upakāraka tvena pradhāna ākāṅkṣā pūraṇe sāmarthyāt vikalpam manyate iti tantraratna ādi grantheṣu
kḷpta upakāra tvam eva ākāṅkṣā pūraṇa sāmarthe hetūkṛtam
yat tu bhāṣya vārtika grantha virodha udbhāvanam

original: tatra yā sviṣṭakṛdadhikaraṇe bhāṣyakārasya pañcamapakṣamāśritya kṛtvācintoktiḥ tadāśayaḥ tantraratna eva darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yā sviṣṭakṛt adhikaraṇe bhāṣyakārasya pañcama pakṣam āśritya kṛtvā acintā uktiḥ tad āśayaḥ tantraratne eva darśitaḥ
gṛhamedhīye hi ājyabhāgābhyām sajātīya yāga antara upasthāpanāt tad nivṛttiḥ eva iti vidheya aśeṣa kāryāṇām

original: anivṛttau satyāṃ cintyate kiṃ sviṣṭakṛdvidhānaṃ śeṣakāryāṇāṃ parisaṅkhyārthaṃ naveti tantraratne uktam /
analyzed: anivṛttau satyām cintyate kim sviṣṭakṛt vidhānam śeṣa kāryāṇām parisaṅkhyā artham na vā iti tantraratne uktam
na hi ayam vicāraḥ ṣṭame pakṣe upapadyate
tadā hi codaka lopāt sarveṣām eva nivṛtteḥ vicāra ayogāt

original: ato 'yaṃ vicāraḥ śeṣakāryāṇāṃ anivṛttyupajīvyaḥ pañcamapakṣasya kṛtvā cintayaiva ghaṭate iti siddhānta eva cintopapatteḥ ityayuktaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: atas yam vicāraḥ śeṣa kāryāṇām anivṛtti upajīvyaḥ pañcama pakṣasya kṛtvā cintayā eva ghaṭate iti siddhāntaḥ eva cintā upapatteḥ iti ayuktam vacaḥ
yat ca vārtike pañcama pakṣa udāharaṇa pradarśanam

original: tat tatra cānyatraceti saptamyoḥ prāpte iti saptamyā sāmānādhikaraṇyapakṣe prāptipūrvakānyanivṛttipradarśanāyodāharaṇe pradarśanīye spaṣṭatvādeva
analyzed: tat tatra ca anyatra ca iti saptamyoḥ prāpte iti saptamyā sāmānādhikaraṇya pakṣe prāpti pūrvaka anya nivṛtti pradarśanāya udāharaṇe pradarśanīye spaṣṭa tvāt eva

original: hetoḥ spaṣṭatvaṃ tarkataḥ prāptyapekṣayā śāstrataḥ prāptau sulabhameveti na sādhakam /
analyzed: hetoḥ spaṣṭa tvam tarkataḥ prāpti apekṣayā śāstrataḥ prāptau sulabham evā iti na sādhakam
yat api daśama saptama pāda dvitīya adhikaraṇa gata ājyabhāga vat vā iti dṛṣṭānta vivaraṇa para bhāṣya virodha udbhāvanam
tat api mandam

original: tatrājyabhāgavadvānirdeśāt parisaṅkhyā syāditi sūtre nirdeśāt parisaṅkhyātvamucyate,
analyzed: tatra ājyabhāga vat vā nirdeśāt parisaṅkhyā syāt iti sūtre nirdeśāt parisaṅkhyā tvam ucyate

original: nirdeśaśca ekādaśa vai paśoravadānānītyukto bhāṣye vivṛtaśca /
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ ca ekādaśa vai paśoḥ avadānāni iti uktaḥ bhāṣye vivṛtaḥ ca
tatra prāpta tvāt eva eṣām eva vidhiḥ na saṃbhavati

original: ānarthakyānnānuvādo nirguṇaṃ ca punaḥśravaṇamitareṣāṃ aśrutānāṃ parisaṅkhyāpakaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: ānarthakyāt na anuvādaḥ nirguṇam ca punaḥśravaṇam itareṣām aśrutānām parisaṅkhyāpakam bhavati iti
na hi atra ākāṅkṣā nivṛtti mūlā nivṛttiḥ aṣṭama pakṣa nyāyena saṃbhavati
ekādaśānām avadāna vidhānena itara avayavānām avadāna ākāṅkṣā anuparamāt

original: ataḥ ājyabhāgavaditi dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa pañcamapakṣaparatayā vyākhyātam /
analyzed: atas ājyabhāga vat iti dṛṣṭānta upādānam bhāṣyakāreṇa pañcama pakṣa para tayā vyākhyātam

original: tasminneva pakṣe ekādaśavyatiriktāni netyarthalābhāt taduttarasūtre tasyāṃ traidoṣyamāpādya nirdeśasya anyathopapattirāpāditā /
analyzed: tasmin eva pakṣe ekādaśa vyatiriktāni na iti artha lābhāt tad uttara sūtre tasyām traidoṣyam āpādya nirdeśasya anyathā upapattiḥ āpāditā

original: atastatra agatyā pañcamapakṣaparatayā vivaraṇe kṛte 'pi naitāvatā ājyabhāgavākye
analyzed: atas tatra agatyā pañcama pakṣa para tayā vivaraṇe kṛte na etāvatā ājyabhāga vākye
ṣṭama pakṣe phalataḥ parisaṅkhyā tvam duṣyati iti abhipretya eva gṛhamedhīya adhikaraṇe
spaṣṭam eva parisaṅkhyā tvam aṣṭame pakṣe abhidhāsyate pūjya pādaiḥ
dīkṣitaiḥ api uktam

original: yattu -- siddhāntaleśagranthe dīkṣitaiḥ parisaṅkhyodāharaṇaṃ “ājyabhāgau yajatīti pradarśya gṛhamedhīyādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣarītyā idamudāharaṇam  #
analyzed: yat tu siddhāntaleśa granthe dīkṣitaiḥ parisaṅkhyā udāharaṇam ājyabhāgau yajati iti pradarśya gṛhamedhīya adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa rītyā idam udāharaṇam
iti uktam

original: taddvayoḥ śeṣiṇorekasya śeṣasya vaikasmin śeṣiṇi dvayoḥ śeṣayorvā nityaprāptau śeṣyantarasya
analyzed: tat dvayoḥ śeṣiṇoḥ ekasya śeṣasya vā ekasmin śeṣiṇi dvayoḥ śeṣayoḥ vā nitya prāptau śeṣi antarasya

original: śeṣāntarasya vā nivṛttiphalakastṛtīya iti pūrvoktaparisaṅkhyālakṣaṇe nityaprāptivivakṣayā
analyzed: śeṣa antarasya vā nivṛtti phalakaḥ tṛtīyaḥ iti pūrva ukta parisaṅkhyā lakṣaṇe nitya prāpti vivakṣayā
prāpta parisaṅkhyā pradarśana artham
na tu etāvatā prāpta parisaṅkhyā tva aṅgīkāreṇa viruddham iti na apūrva vidhi lakṣaṇam tatra

original: yattu -- mīmāṃsāvedāntagrantheṣu parisaṅkhyātvena vyavahāro na dṛṣṭa iti,
analyzed: yat tu mīmāṃsā vedānta grantheṣu parisaṅkhyā tvena vyavahāraḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti
tatra uttaram kva vā karma siddhānta vākye bhavat upapādita upasaṃhāra vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tathā brahma saṃbandha vākye bhavat upapādita niyama vidhi vyavahāraḥ vā iti vaktavyam

original: vyavahārasya yena kenacidrūpeṇa sāmānyataḥ karaṇe 'pi nyāyataḥ prāptaṃ tattadvidhitvaṃ
analyzed: vyavahārasya yena kenacid rūpeṇa sāmānyatas karaṇe nyāyataḥ prāptam tad tad vidhi tvam

original: āpatannaivāpahnotuṃ śakyamiti cedihāpi apūrvatādiśabdenaiva vyavahārasiddhāvapi parisaṅkhyātvaṃ
analyzed: āpatat na eva apahnotum śakyam iti ced iha api apūrva tā ādi śabdena eva vyavahāra siddhau api parisaṅkhyā tvam
na apahnotum śakyam iti tulyam
na hi atra apūrva tā śabdena apūrva vidhi tvam vivakṣitam
kintu prakṛti pūrva tva abhāvaḥ iti na kiñcid etat
prastutam anusarāmaḥ

original: yattu --- dṛṣṭārtho vidhiḥ niyamavidhiriti dīkṣitaiḥ kṛtaṃ niyamavidhilakṣaṇamityarthādadṛṣṭārthavidhirapūrvavidhi riti lakṣaṇaṃ apūrvavidherabhipretamiti  #
analyzed: yat tu dṛṣṭa arthaḥ vidhiḥ niyama vidhiḥ iti dīkṣitaiḥ kṛtam niyama vidhi lakṣaṇam iti arthāt adṛṣṭa artha vidhiḥ apūrva vidhiḥ iti lakṣaṇam apūrva vidheḥ abhipretam iti
varṇayanti iti
tat na uttare han dvi rātrasya gṛhyate iti atra ativyāpteḥ
kiñca adṛṣṭa artha tvam kim adṛṣṭa rūpam uddeśyam phalam ādāya
uta adṛṣṭa dvāram ādāya
na ādyaḥ dṛṣṭa phala arthe kārīrya ādi vidhau avyāpteḥ
na antyaḥ stuti artha tva prāpake sāmnā stuvīta iti vidhau avyāpteḥ

original: tatra ṛgakṣarābhivyaktirūpadvārasya adṛṣṭatvābhāvādato nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: tatra ṛk akṣara abhivyakti rūpa dvārasya adṛṣṭa tva abhāvāt atas na idam lakṣaṇam yuktam

original: (B1) eteṣāñcopādhīnāṃ kvacidudāharaṇe sāṅkarye 'pi na doṣa iti na vidhirasāyanoktalakṣaṇadūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām ca upādhīnām kvacid udāharaṇe sāṅkarye na doṣaḥ iti na vidhi rasāyana ukta lakṣaṇa dūṣaṇa avakāśaḥ
vistareṇa ca etat asmad kṛte mīmāṃsākaustubhe draṣṭavyam
tat evam mantrāṇām artha smāraka tve pi na viniyoga vaiyarthyam
yat tu khaṇḍana kārāṇām prakṛta vidheḥ yat yat uddeśya tā avacchedakam apūrvīya tva anyat
tena rūpeṇa uddeśye yad prakṛta vidhi abhāve tideśa anya prakṛta vidhi samāna śākhīya vidhitaḥ
saṃbhavat prāptikam vidheyam bhāva rūpam tad viṣayaḥ vidhiḥ apūrva vidhiḥ iti apūrva vidhi lakṣaṇam

original: tatrāpūrvīyatvena rūpeṇa vrīhiṣvatyantāprāptamavaghātaṃ prāpayatyavaghātavidhāvativyāptivāraṇāyā pūrvīyatvānyaditi viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: tatra apūrvīya tvena rūpeṇa vrīhiṣu atyanta aprāptam avaghātam prāpayati avaghāta vidhau ativyāpti vāraṇāya āpūrvīya tva anyat iti viśeṣaṇam
tena rūpeṇa ca tādṛśa puroḍāśa vidhitaḥ vaghātasya saṃbhavat prāptika tvāt na ativyāptiḥ

original: tādṛśoddeśyatāvacchedakarūpeṇeti vivakṣaṇāt gavāmayanādyāhargatayorvāyavāgratāvidhyoḥ dārśikasvargakāmavidhau ca nāvyāptiḥ ;
analyzed: tādṛśa uddeśya tā avacchedaka rūpeṇa iti vivakṣaṇāt gavāmayana ādya ahar gatayoḥ vāyavāgratā vidhyoḥ dārśika svarga kāma vidhau ca na avyāptiḥ

original: tatra tryanīkāvidhitaḥ prathamabhāgatvena rūpeṇa aindravāyavāgratāyāḥ prāptisatve
analyzed: tatra tryanīka a vidhitaḥ prathama bhāga tvena rūpeṇa aindra vāyava agra tāyāḥ prāpti satve
pi sva uddeśya tā avacchedaka ahar tva rūpeṇa prāpti abhāvāt sārvakāmya vidhi kāmyamāna tvena

original: rūpeṇoddeśye svarge prāptisaṃbhave 'pi svargatvena rūpeṇa tadabhāvānnāvyāptiḥ /
analyzed: rūpeṇa uddeśye svarge prāpti saṃbhave svarga tvena rūpeṇa tad abhāvāt na avyāptiḥ

original: atideśabhinnetivivakṣaṇāt vaikṛteṣu pratigrāhyavidhiṣu dvādaśāhantryanīkāntargatāgratāvidhyośca atideśataḥ prāptisaṃbhavena nāvyāptiḥ //
analyzed: atideśa bhinna iti vivakṣaṇāt vaikṛteṣu pratigrāhya vidhiṣu dvādaśa aha ntryanīka antargata agra tā vidhyoḥ ca atideśataḥ prāpti saṃbhavena na avyāptiḥ
samāna śākhīya iti viśeṣaṇāt śākhā antara vidhitaḥ saṃbhavat prāptika śākhā antara gata agnihotra ādi vidhiṣu na avyāptiḥ

original: yatra yadupakārajanakatayā yadvidhisthitaṃ tanna tadupakārajanakatayā tasya yādṛcchikyā
analyzed: yatra yad upakāra janaka tayā yad vidhi sthitam tat na tad upakāra janaka tayā tasya yādṛcchikyā
api anuṣṭhāna yogya tā āpatti apara paryāyāḥ prāpteḥ abhāvasya vivakṣita tvāt na hiraṇyagarbha mantra pūtīka niyama vidhyoḥ ativyāptiḥ
bhāva pada upādānāt aprāpta nivṛtti prāpake parisaṃkhyā vidhau na ativyāptiḥ

original: evameva vidhirasāyanāpāditāvyāptyativyāptiparihāreṇa sudhībhiridaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sarvatra yojanīyaṃ iti //
analyzed: evam eva vidhi rasāyana āpādita avyāpti ativyāpti parihāreṇa sudhībhiḥ idam lakṣaṇam sarvatra yojanīyam iti
tat ayuktam
vidhitas saṃbhavat prāptikayoḥ gauṇyāḥ yādṛcchika prāptim ādāya bhavat upapāditayoḥ hiraṇyagarbha pūtīka niyama vidhyoḥ tathābhūta vidhitas saṃbhavat prāptika tvena ativyāpteḥ
